casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joseph M. JOHNSTON. No. 452P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of September 2008 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2008."
